metadata.title: CVE-2016-9011 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The wmf_malloc function in api.c in libwmf 0.2.8.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted wmf file, which triggers a memory allocation failure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-9011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwmf-bin - 0.2.8.4-12
libwmf0.2-7 - 0.2.8.4-12
libwmf0.2-7-gtk - 0.2.8.4-12
No subscription required

notes.note: leosilva> debian fixed that with the debian proposed patch.

criterions.comment: libwmf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.2.8.4-12').
